ai-patthana12.6:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.6:1.1_0: for someone without seeing the teaching you shouldn’t give up desires.
ai-patthana12.6:2.1_0: unable to give up without seeing the teaching,
ai-patthana12.6:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give up any desire, any greed for thoughts.
ai-patthana12.6:3.1_1: You shouldn’t give up any desire, nor get rid of the teaching,
ai-patthana12.6:3.1_2: You shouldn’t give up a teaching without seeing. ...
ai-patthana12.6:3.1_3: You shouldn’t give up without a teaching for the sake of not seeing,
ai-patthana12.6:4.1_0: that cannot be given up through development (of the First Path),
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_0: You shouldn’t think about the teaching ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_1: You shouldn’t think about the teaching ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_2: You shouldn’t give a teaching without formal support. ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_3: You shouldn’t give rise to the teaching. ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_4: You shouldn’t give a teaching to someone without rapture. ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_6: We won’t go for refuge to that same teaching.
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_7: He should not give a teaching, nor use it for the future.
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_8: He should not give a teaching through the happiness of the glory ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_9: He should not give a teaching through the happiness of the general population. ...
ai-patthana12.6:5.1_11: He should not give a teaching for the following.
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_0: He should not give a teaching,
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_1: He should not give a teaching for her,
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_2: There’s no way for teaching or in the formless.
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_3: don’t give rise to the full ordination,
ai-patthana12.6:6.1_5: He should not give a teaching to someone in the formless,
ai-patthana12.6:7.1_0: We won’t give a teaching to someone else.
ai-patthana12.6:7.1_1: He should not give a teaching to someone like a circumstances.
ai-patthana12.6:7.1_2: He should not give a teaching to anyone holding a sheath.
ai-patthana12.6:7.1_3: He should not give a teaching to anyone holding on to it.
ai-patthana12.6:8.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching to it.
ai-patthana12.6:9.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to the supreme teaching.
ai-patthana12.6:10.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to the cause for refuge. You shouldn’t give rise to any cause or reason for nine reason.
ai-patthana12.6:11.1_0: Only cause or reason it doesn’t give rise to cause a reason for cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.6:11.1_1: or cause a reason for sake of refuge,
ai-patthana12.6:12.1_1: Not cause or reason, without cause or condition.
ai-patthana12.6:13.1_1: Not for the sake of refuge or for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana12.6:13.1_3: This is the section in brief.
